what-we-create-text: In the box you will find everything you need to make a cool mosaic, which will become not only a beautiful decoration, but also useful in a fight.
secret-text: We have created sets that will delight every member of the family! The details of the puzzles are medium in size, so it will be convenient for a child to assemble them.
creative-text: We have created sets that will delight every member of the family! The details of the puzzles are medium in size, so it will be convenient for a child to assemble them. And the process is so interesting that all adults will love to join in and think about giving such a set to their friends
name: name
requisites-text: Together with the confirmation of the order, you will receive details for paying for the product.
confirm-text: Review your order details and place it if everything is fine.
about-us-intiduction-title: Let's get to know each other!
about-us-text1: Collecting puzzles from ceramic tiles, you will immerse yourself in a wonderful world and distract yourself from everyday issues
about-us-text2: I'm Olga, the ideological leader of the Kryva Mozaik project. Designer with many years of work experience! For a long time, she created floor designs from marble and porcelain stoneware. I am fond of collecting puzzles, mosaics.
about-us-text3: Olga Bogryashova (designer). Ideological leader of the “Kriva Mosaica” project
master-class-title: Kriva Mosaica is a mosaic studio in Kharkiv.
master-class-text: We have suspended all master classes and courses while the war continues in Ukraine. We believe in victory and hope for a quick return to our creative life. We offer kits for independent creativity to everyone.
master-class-text2: From each sale, we transfer funds to support the Armed Forces
what-in-box-title: What is included in the set?
what-in-box-text: Curved Mosaic is a unique product made of ceramic tiles. Holding our set in your hands, you get puzzles for creativity, which you can assemble from A to Z yourself! In a box you will find everything you need to realize a cool mosaic, which will become not only a beautiful decoration, and it will come in handy in a beating.
no-items-cart: No items in cart go to the shop, please
product-size-title: The set includes everything you need to create a mosaic at home.
product-size-description: The size of the finished mosaic
details: Details of a mosaic made of ceramic tiles:
